SELECT t.id, t.transfer_date, t.transfer_type_code AS transTypeCode, s1.name AS transTypeName, t.position_code AS positionCode, p1.name AS positionName, t.employee_id AS empId, e.name AS empName, t.prev_dept_code AS prevDeptCode, d1.name AS prevDeptName, t.curr_dept_code AS currDeptCode, d2.name AS currDeptName, t.approval_id FROM transfer t JOIN employee e ON t.employee_id = e.id LEFT JOIN detail_sys_code s1 ON t.transfer_type_code = s1.detail_code LEFT JOIN detail_sys_code p1 ON t.position_code = p1.detail_code LEFT JOIN detail_sys_code d1 ON t.prev_dept_code = d1.detail_code LEFT JOIN detail_sys_code d2 ON t.curr_dept_code = d2.detail_code JOIN approval a ON t.approval_id = a.id
AND a.id = #{srhApprovalId}
AND a.approval_status_code = 'APV002'
AND (e.name LIKE '%' || #{srhIdOrName} || '%' OR e.id LIKE '%' || #{srhIdOrName} || '%')
AND t.transfer_date BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{srhStrDate}, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AND TO_DATE(#{srhEndDate}, 'yyyy-MM-dd')
AND t.transfer_type_code = #{srhTrsTypeCode}
ORDER BY t.transfer_date DESC, t.id DESC
